TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi XPathMessageContext extends System.Xml.Xsl.XsltContext

summary.span: 定義數個在對 SOAP 文件評估 XPath 運算式時常用的 XPath 函式和命名空間對應。

span.span: Defines several XPath functions and namespace mappings commonly used when evaluating XPath expressions against SOAP documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XPath 引擎提供完整的 XPath 內容支援，並且和 一樣，會使用 .NET Framework 的 類別來實作這項支援。The XPath engine has full XPath context support and uses the .NET Framework's class in the same way that does to implement this support. 是一個抽象類別，開發人員可以用來實作自訂 XPath 函式程式庫和宣告 XPath 變數。 is an abstract class that allows developers to implement custom XPath function libraries and declare XPath variables. 是 ，因此也會包含命名空間前置詞對應。 is an and thus also contains the namespace prefix mappings. 篩選引擎會實作名為 的 。The filter engine implements an named . 會定義可在 XPath 運算式中使用的自訂函式，並且會宣告數個通用的命名空間前置詞對應。 defines custom functions that can be used in XPath expressions and it declares several common namespace prefix mappings. 下表列出所定義的自訂函式可用 XPath 運算式中。The following table lists the custom functions defined by that can be used in XPath expressions. |XPath 函式XPath Function|描述Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |bodybody|傳回在 SOAP Body 節點，不論 SOAP 版本 (1.1。Returns the SOAP Body node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1. 或 1.2）。or 1.2).| |標頭header|傳回的 SOAP 標頭的節點，不論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。Returns the SOAP Header node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |correlation-datacorrelation-data|接受輸入的字串並傳回相關聯的相互關聯訊息屬性的值。Takes an input string and returns the value of the associated correlation message property. ' wsc instanceId' 是保留的字串，用於以內容為主的相互關聯。'wsc-instanceId' is a reserved string used for context-based correlation.| |messageIdmessageId|傳回與 Ws-addressing MessageID 標頭的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing MessageID header.| |relatesTorelatesTo|傳回與 Ws-addressing RelatesTo 標頭，不限於任何版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing RelatesTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |replyToreplyTo|傳回 Ws-addressing ReplyTo 標頭，不限於任何版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing ReplyTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |由from|傳回從 WS 定址標頭的值，不限於任何版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0）。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing From header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |faultTofaultTo|傳回與 Ws-addressing FaultTo 標頭，不限於任何版本 （August2004 或 WSA 1.0） 的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing FaultTo header, regardless of version (August2004 or WSA 1.0).| |設為to|傳回值的 WS 定址標頭的如果有的話，否則它會傳回匿名。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing To header if present, else it returns Anonymous.| |actionaction|傳回的 Ws-addressing 動作標頭的值。Returns the value of the WS-Addressing Action header.| |soap-urisoap-uri|傳回的 SOAP 命名空間 uri。Returns the SOAP namespace uri.| |headers-with-actorheaders-with-actor|接受的 SOAP 動作項目 uri 會傳回含有該動作項目，不論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本的所有標頭。Takes a SOAP Actor uri and returns all headers that contain that actor, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |動作項目actor|傳回的 SOAP 動作項目 uri 的第一個子節點，不論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。Returns the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-mandatoryis-mandatory|傳回第一個子節點為強制性，不論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。Returns whether or not the first child node is mandatory, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-actor-nextis-actor-next|傳回第一個子節點的 SOAP 動作項目 uri 擔任下一步 角色，無論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the Next role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |is-actor-ultimate-receiveris-actor-ultimate-receiver|傳回第一個子節點的 SOAP 動作項目 uri 擔任 UltimateReceiver 角色，無論 （1.1 或 1.2） 的 SOAP 版本。Returns whether or not the SOAP Actor uri of the first child node assumes the UltimateReceiver role, regardless of SOAP version (1.1 or 1.2).| |日期時間date-time|接受輸入的日期字串並傳回轉換成雙精度浮點數的值。Takes an input date string and returns the value converted to a double.| |持續期間duration|接受輸入的 timespan 字串，並傳回值為總天數。Takes an input timespan string and returns the value as a total number of days.| |utc-nowutc-now|傳回的值。Returns the value of .| 下表列出所宣告的預設命名空間和命名空間前置詞。The following table lists the default namespaces and namespace prefixes that are declared by . |前置詞Prefix|命名空間Namespace| |------------|---------------| |s11s11|http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope| |s12s12|http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope| |wsaAugust2004wsaAugust2004|http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2004/08/addressing| |wsa10wsa10|http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing| |/smsm|http://schemas.microsoft.com/serviceModel/2004/05/xpathfunctions| |tempuritempuri|http://tempuri.org| |serser|http://schemas.microsoft.com/2003/10/Serialization|

param.name: table
param.span: 在內部用於儲存字串的 類別。

span.span: A class used internally to store strings.

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 許多類別 (包括這個 類別) 和 會在內部使用 類別，以儲存屬性和項目名稱。Several classes including this one, , and use the class internally to store attribute and element names. 當項目或屬性名稱在 XML 文件中出現多次時，它只會在 中儲存一次。When an element or attribute name occurs multiple times in an XML document, it is stored only once in the . 這些名稱會儲存為 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 物件型別。The names are stored as common language runtime (CLR) object types. 這可讓您對這些字串進行物件比較，而不需要更耗費資源的字串比較。This enables you to do object comparisons on these strings rather than a more expensive string comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int CompareDocument (string baseUri, string nextBaseUri);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 CompareDocument(string baseUri, string nextBaseUri) cil managed
Public Overrides Function CompareDocument (baseUri As String, nextBaseUri As String) As Integer
public: override int CompareDocument(System::String ^ baseUri, System::String ^ nextBaseUri);

param.name: baseUri
param.span: 第一份要比較之文件的基底 URI。

span.span: The base URI of the first document to compare.

param.name: nextBaseUri
param.span: 第二份要比較之文件的基底 URI。

span.span: The base URI of the second document to compare.

summary.span: 根據 XSLT 處理器載入兩個文件的順序，比較它們的基底統一資源識別元 (URI)。

span.span: Compares the base Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) of two documents based upon the order the documents were loaded by the XSLT processor.
Always returns 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該在衍生類別中覆寫，才能加以使用。This property should be overridden in a derived class in order to be used.

span.span: Evaluates whether to preserve white space nodes or strip them for the given context.
Always returns .

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction ResolveFunction (string prefix, string name, System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[] argTypes);

Public Overrides Function ResolveFunction (prefix As String, name As String, argTypes As XPathResultType()) As IXsltContextFunction
public: override System::Xml::Xsl::IXsltContextFunction ^ ResolveFunction(System::String ^ prefix, System::String ^ name, cli::array <System::Xml::XPath::XPathResultType> ^ argTypes);

param.name: prefix
param.span: 函式出現在 XPath 運算式時所具有的前置詞。

span.span: The prefix of the function as it appears in the XPath expression.
The name of the function.

param.name: argTypes
param.span: 要加以解析之函式的引數型別陣列。

span.span: An array of argument types for the function being resolved.

param.span: 這讓您可以選取具有相同名稱的方法 (例如，多載方法)。

span.span: This allows you to select between methods with the same name (for example, overloaded methods).

summary.span: 解析函式參考並傳回表示該函式的 [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm)。

span.span: Resolves a function reference and returns an [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm) that represents the function.
An [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm) that represents the function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm)在執行時間用來評估此函數。The [T:System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction](ms-help://MS.MSSDK.1033/MS.WinFXSDK.1033/cpref37/html/T_System_Xml_Xsl_IXsltContextFunction.htm) is used at execution time to evaluate the function.
